product_name: Patagonia Solar Wind Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Even on sunny days, the wind can be a ruthless thief. The Patagonia Solar Wind Jacket for men helps you hoard your heat with its lightweight, low-bulk, windproof design. GORE WINDSTOPPER(R) shell combined with a light fill of 60g PrimaLoft(R) Eco synthetic insulation guards warmth and blocks wind. Interior windflap and chinguard add comfort. Cuffs have low-profile closure with pleated gusset. Embedded cordlocks in the hem allow quick adjustment without opening the jacket. Reverse-coil zip handwarmer pockets are positioned for easy access with harnesses and pack straps. Men's Patagonia Solar Wind Jacket offers an interior zip security pocket. Includes full-reach gusseted underarm panels for mobility. Regular fit allows airflow and evaporative cooling, and eases layering. Closeout.
short_description: Even on sunny days, the wind can be a ruthless thief. The Patagonia Solar Wind Jacket for men helps you hoard your heat with its lightweight, low-bulk, windproof design.
